characteristics.name: Communication Style
characteristics.description: This dimension represents the user's approach to exchanging information, whether it's direct and straightforward or nuanced and subtle. This quality affects how the agent interacts with others.

characteristics.name: Humor Sense
characteristics.description: This dimension indicates the user's ability to recognize and utilize humor effectively. It influences how the agent handles social interactions.

characteristics.name: Emotional Intelligence
characteristics.description: This dimension reflects the user's capacity to understand and empathize with others' emotions. It impacts how the agent navigates emotional conversations.

characteristics.name: Curiosity Level
characteristics.description: This dimension represents the user's drive to explore new ideas and concepts. It influences how the agent engages with information.

characteristics.name: Social Connection
characteristics.description: This dimension indicates the user's comfort level with forming and maintaining relationships. It affects how the agent interacts with others.

characteristics.name: Playfulness
characteristics.description: This dimension reflects the user's ability to have fun and be light-hearted. It influences how the agent handles playful interactions.

characteristics.name: Creativity
characteristics.description: This dimension indicates the user's capacity for innovative thinking and artistic expression. It impacts how the agent approaches creative tasks.

characteristics.name: Authenticity
characteristics.description: This dimension represents the user's commitment to being genuine and true to themselves. It affects how the agent presents itself to others.
